Responsibilities: Application Development: Design, develop, test, and deploy scalable applications using C# and .NET (Core/Framework)
API Development: Implement, maintain, and optimize APIs and web applications using ASP.NET and MVC
Cloud Integration: Work with AWS services such as EC2, S3, and RDS to build scalable and secure solutions
Database Development: Design and maintain schemas, queries, and stored procedures using SQL
Code Quality: Apply object-oriented principles and design patterns, perform code reviews, and follow software development best practices
Troubleshooting: Debug, troubleshoot, and upgrade existing applications to improve performance and reliability
Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and deliver effective solutions
Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with emerging technologies and contribute to knowledge sharing within the team
Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
7+ years of proven experience as a .NET / C# Developer
Strong knowledge of .NET Framework / .NET Core, C#, and OOP concepts
Hands-on experience with ASP.NET, MVC, and API development
Proficiency in SQL and database design
Strong understanding of software development best practices and design patterns
Detail-oriented with a passion for delivering high-quality, efficient software solutions
Benefits: Trident Consulting is an award-winning IT/engineering staffing company with recent awards including: 2022, 2021, 2020 – Inc. 5000 fastest-growing private companies in America, 2022, 2021 – SF Business Times 100 fastest-growing private companies in Bay Area
